ANCHOR_STONE.description: A dense, black rock that refuses to move.
ANCHOR_STONE.usage_msg: Gordon kicks the heavy stone into the abyss. The rope snaps taut.

SILENT_KNIFE.description: A ceramic blade that cuts without sound.
SILENT_KNIFE.usage_msg: The Red String is cut. The paper walls collapse.

TIME_BRACELET.usage_msg: The hands spin counter-clockwise, rewinding the drag.

BUCKET_OF_LIME.usage_msg: Gordon whitewashes the 'Sorry' from the walls.

STABILITY_PIZZA.usage_msg: It tastes like childhood cartoons and hot plastic.

STAR_COMPASS.description: Points to True North, ignoring the maze.
STAR_COMPASS.usage_msg: The needle locks onto a fixed point.

THERMOS.description: Keeps the coffee hot in the cold.
